comment: In the beginning, men oppressed women in order to have free will. Now women control men through sexual manipulation. The future lies in making women sexually obsolete. Then the circle will close the cycle again for men to have agency again.
amr:
# ::snt In the beginning, men oppressed women in order to have free will. Now women control men through sexual manipulation. The future lies in making women sexually obsolete. Then the circle will close the cycle again for men to have agency again.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / oppress-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / man)
            :ARG1 (w / woman)
            :purpose (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 m2
                  :ARG1 (w2 / will-02
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1-of (f / free-04)))
            :time (b / begin-01))
      :snt2 (c / control-01
            :ARG0 (w3 / woman)
            :ARG1 (m3 / man)
            :manner (s / sex-01)
            :time (n / now))
      :snt3 (l / lie-07
            :ARG1 (f2 / future)
            :ARG2 (m4 / make-02
                  :ARG0 f2
                  :ARG1 (o2 / obsolete
                        :domain (w4 / woman)
                        :manner (s2 / sexual))))
      :snt4 (c2 / close-01
            :ARG0 (c3 / circle)
            :ARG1 (c4 / cycle-02)
            :purpose (h2 / have-03
                  :ARG0 (m5 / man)
                  :ARG1 (a / agency)
                  :mod (a2 / again))
            :mod (a3 / again)
            :time (t / then)))
